PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-06852018-06-06,  ,  ,  ,  ISED
ActTelecommunications Act
SubjectCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) ** Retail sales practices **
PrecisOrder Requiring the Canadian Radio-Television and Telecommunications (CRTC) to make a report by no later than February 28, 2019, regarding the RETAIL SALES PRACTICES of Canada's large telecommunications carriers.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
